name: Turretwar 2
description:
In this real time action strategy multiplayer game you have to destroy the enemy bases and protect your base from the enemy turrets. Throw granades to defeat masses of enemy turrets and claim checkpoints to respawn from them when you are defeated.

New features since Turretwar(1):

- 3rd person Camera.
- Play with or against bots.
- Checkpoints that can be claimed.
- Walkable lobby room.
- Serverlist
- Serverpasswords to let only your friends join your game.
- Launcher that keeps the game up to date.

Note:

This new game is still in development and the game may contain bugs.

Things i plan to add in upcoming versions:

- More abilities.
- More turret types.
- More maps.

Controls:

WASD: Move the player.

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Right Mouse Button: Command your turrets to move.

Q: Throw grenade.

E: Heal yourself and your turrets.

Alt: Unlock/Lock cursor.

Alt+F4: Quit game
